page.title: 17FAMILY TRANSPORT
page.content: My family has two cars. A 'Maestro' and a 'Mini'. My dad and mum can both drive and my big sister can as well. My big brother is learning to drive. My sister takes the 'mini' to college to save her bus fares. I have a bike but it isn't road worthy so I play with it instead. For Christmas this year I hope to get a bike so I can try to pass the Cycling Proficiency Test. It is run by the Police. It is quite handy to have two cars because you can go with somebody while the others go somewhere else. We usually take the 'Maestro' to Dumfries on Saturdays to do some shopping. We shop in Dumfries because there is a good selection of shops there.
